extended_metaphor.metaphor: Both Pituitary Gland in endocrine system and Pitch framing in baseball have centralized control
extended_metaphor.pituitary_gland: The Pituitary Gland acts as a central control hub within the endocrine system, coordinating and regulating the functions of various glands to maintain overall balance and harmony in the body.
extended_metaphor.pitch_framing: Similarly, Pitch framing in baseball serves as a centralized mechanism performed by catchers to influence umpires' calls by skillfully presenting a pitch to make it appear more like a strike, ultimately affecting the balance of the game.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: Both Pituitary Gland in endocrine system and Pitch framing in baseball have feedback control
extended_metaphor.pituitary_gland: The Pituitary Gland operates with a feedback control system, continuously monitoring hormone levels and adjusting secretion to regulate bodily functions and maintain homeostasis.
extended_metaphor.pitch_framing: In parallel, Pitch framing in baseball employs feedback control tactics by catchers, who dynamically adjust and present the pitch to provide favorable feedback to the umpire, subtly influencing the strike zone and game dynamics.
